掅字的基本解释

掅
qìng
抓住。

掅
qiàn
　ㄑㄧㄢˋ
古通“倩”，请求。

掅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qìng］
［《廣韻》千定切，去徑，清。］
(1)抓，揪。
(2)请人为己做事。用同“倩”。

掅字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掅； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页436第16
【唐韻】【集韻】?千定切，靑去聲。【博雅】持也。一曰捽也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?七正切，音倩。義同。　又與倩通。【六書統】假人力曰掅。

掅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
掅字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
qìng
Catch.
Squeeze
qiàn
ㄑ ㄧ ㄢ
Gu Tong "Qian", request.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qìng］
["Guangyun" Thousand fixed cuts, go to the path, clear. ]
(1) Grab, pull.
(2) Ask people to do things for themselves. Use the same as "Qian".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Collection】【Hand Character Department】　掅; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 436-16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Thousands of fixed cuts, Qiao go to sound. [Bo Ya] Hold it. One said, also.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? Seven tangent, Yinqian. The same meaning.　And Qiantong again. [Six Books] The fake manpower is said to be broken.
